description: Temporary Help Services, General Office Support : digitize physical records to reduce space requirements and carry out imaging activities
full_summary:
# Tender Notice

## Request for Proposal: Digitization of Security Files

### Reference Information

* Reference Number: PW-23-01030564
* Solicitation Number: T8080-220625
* Publication Date: March 22, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: April 5, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. (EST)

### Description

Transport Canada is seeking a contract for Temporary Help Services to digitize physical security files. The goal of the project is to reduce current and future space requirements by imaging physical records. A Request for Proposal (RFP) has been issued to qualified suppliers.

### Contract Details

* Contract Duration: Up to 48 weeks from contract award
* Number of Resources Required: Six (6) resources
* Location: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Trade Agreements

The contract is open to suppliers who are qualified under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

* Fanie Charron, Procurement Specialist
* Email: [fanie.charron@tc.gc.ca](mailto:fanie.charron@tc.gc.ca)
* Phone: None
* Fax: None

You can view the tender notice and download the Request for Proposal document from the Canada Buys website: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)

### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: April 5, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. (EST)
* Contract Award Date: To be determined

Note: The above text has been rewritten to improve readability and clarity, while maintaining all the relevant information from the original document. The format has been changed to a more standard and professional layout, with clear headings and section breaks.  Person
